amendment.description: An amendment numbered 92 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to reduce funding for Department of Education Departmental Management by $37,735,000.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce funding for Department of Education Departmental Management by $37,735,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Crane amendment (A040) Failed by recorded vote: 151 - 273 (Roll no. 663).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Crane amendment (A040) Failed by recorded vote: 151 - 273 (Roll no. 663).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
